p.1: 3-5 years of experience as a Machine Learning Engineer with experience refactoring code for a production environment

li: Good communication skills (requirement gathering with Data Scientists)

text: Insight Global is looking for a Machine Learning Engineer with strong Python software development skills to join one of today's largest video game publishing companies. This resource will be responsible for supporting the Global Machine Learning group in moving their Recommender System prototype into production. This applied ML team is currently using a non-production =E2=80=9Cprototyped=E2=80=9D codebase which needs to be re-written from scratch. This resource will oversee the refactoring of the old code with the goal of being able to create a robust and fault tolerant architecture that can be used and maintained by data scientists.
